content.description: Begin by grabbing onto a large horizontal ledge but check for snakes first, this is an excellent place for sunbathing.  This route meanders up the wall moving left and right as you follow the good holds to the top.  All the routes on this wall are sustained and pumpy, but this route is a true pump fest and will have you calling "take" if you don't give it the respect it deserves.
content.location: This is the 2nd bolted route on the wall, just right of Boothe.

content.description: A fun route with good moves.  The crux is getting started.  Once you get past the opening moves the climbing backs way off.
content.location: This is the 3rd bolted route on the wall and is just right of Johnny the Boy.  Starts just left of the white section of wall.

content.description: This route climbs up past big horizontal ledges and makes some big moves to good holds.  The moves get easier but the wall gets steeper and more pumpy as you move up the wall.
content.location: This is the left most bolted route on this wall.  It starts just left of the rock outcropping on the ground at the base of the cliff.

content.description: This wall is East facing and  gets morning sun.  It is only about 40 feet right of Ivory Coast wall.
